timeline.bodyText: This won't sync properly. You must use Call.payloadDropped(...) so positions are correct clientside.
timeline.author: Anuken

timeline.bodyText: I know the instanceof check technically isn't necessary, but by omitting it you'll be sending extra payload drop packets to clients that won't do anything with it. It's best to keep the check there.
timeline.author: Anuken
